text: Zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yiqie gouhe jiu jinliang liuxing. Shanhong zaizhe fu zha——tamen wei zhizao shoushi he qimin er ronghua de jinshu, yeyou tongyang de fu zha. Zhenzhu ruci chanming zhen wei——zhiyu zhazi ze bei chong zou, zhiyu youyi yu ren de dongxi ze liucun zai dimian shang. Zhenzhu ruci chanming xuduo biyu.
